name: Blight Bounce
description:
Made in 2.75 hours for Trijam #179. All audio was pre-existing, but still made by me.

As the world-destroyer sleeps, he dreams of destroying countless floating islands. However, he is being pursued by a demigod who seeks to destroy him! Help the little ball of darkness lay waste to the peaceful dreamland he finds himself in!

Controls: Left and Right or A and D to move. Don't fall or get hit!

Made in Game Maker Studio 2.
